column5: GOT OUT ON A TRIB FOR SUN UP!!! WAS PLAIN MUD SO WE WERE OFF IN SEARCH FOR A BETTER 1!! HIT ANOTHER AND WAS TOO DIRTY!!! FINALLY AROUND 8:30 WE FOUND DIRTY BUT FISHABLE WATERS!!! RAN INTO A FEW BOYZ I KNOW WHO STUNG ALOT BEFORE I GOT THERE!!! FISHIN CONS WERE TUFF BUT ALITTLE PATIENCE PAYS OFF!!! WE DID GOOD BUT WOULD OF BEEN A GREAT DAY IF WE WERE THERE FOR SUN UP!!! OH WELL LUCK OF THE DRAW!!!  GOT A FEW AROUND 12LB MARK!!! WATERS WERE GOOD TILL 3PM!!! GOT REAL MUDDY THEN AND HIGH!!!              AND GOTTA KEEP THE WIFES GRANDMOTHER HAPPY SO I SAVED HER A SNACK
Wow, some fat clean ones there, silver bullets.
nice chunks of steel there bud.... great pics... cliff...

Great job Scott!  I know the tribs will be blown for a few days...hoping to get out for sun up on Saturday morning...I think Friday may be bad, but I have that day off...may try then too.  Great looking fish there!
TX GUYS!!  YA THE RUN OFF IS REALLY MOVIN NOW CLIFF!!! JUST BE CAREFUL IF YA DO HEAD OUT!! LOTS OF MUD ON SHORES TO SO MAKE SURE YA WEAR BOOTS!!!
Scott have ya been further east (to the 'flow') ... wondering if thats fishable today .... I just got a fresh batch of brown roe tied which sooooo wants to get dnked ....
Hi Scott,  As I usually expect a great report and nice looking steel.  Thanks for sharing  john
beautiful sight!! congrats on the nice catch

Nicely done CC, I drove by the old mill bridge yesterday and noticed the Humber River is still frozen over i cant wait till tribes are totally thawed out and levels drop, soon i will be out there rainbow hunting.
Nice pics and great report, I'm looking to fish friday as well. Just hope they won't be blown.
Great report CC.  Keep em coming.  We love to hear the reports on fishing that have pics.
TX ALL!!! CAM THE FLOW FROM LAST I HEARD WAS UNFISHABLE!!! I'D LOVE TO HELP YA DISPENSE SOME OF THAT BROWN ROE UNDER THE FLOAT  LOL NEXT WEEKS LOOKIN GOOD
Awsome report as usual! Great Success!

Awesome report! I can't wait to get out .... is it worth trying the area right where a trib dumps into the lake? I was down there today and it's flowing pretty good. I'm assuming the fish are staging at the mouth.... I know roe is your bait of choice but if I don't have any, what would you suggest? Cheers!
if your gonna be fishing out east grab a pack of pink worms and youre set.. if if you really want you can buy roe, kris at FOL has some good roe.
